item.title: Cheapest T1 On The Block
item.description: You might think T1 lines are too expensive for your business, but that’s not always true. Let’s explore why. Originally, T1 lines weren’t meant for businesses. Telephone companies developed this “T-carrier” technology for themselves. However, as the internet grew, so did the need for robust digital communication, which T-carrier services like T1 and DS3 could provide. Initially, only large corporations used T1 lines because they could easily afford the high cost.
